content:
I've updated your schedule with the additional commitments:

* Every Tuesday and Thursday, 7 pm - 10 pm: Rehearsals at the local community theater
* Every Saturday morning: Dance classes at the dance studio near your house
* Sundays: Set construction at the theater's workshop
* Fridays: Volunteering at the box office
* April 5th and 19th: Costume fittings at the theater's costume department

Let me ask, are there any specific time slots for the set construction on Sundays and volunteering at the box office on Fridays, or are those flexible/variable?

Also, do you have any other commitments or events you'd like to add to your schedule, or is that it for now?
